sentences.sContent: The neck becomes swollen and painful to the touch (= hurts when you touch it ) .
sentences.sCn: 脖子肿起来了，一碰就疼。

sentences.sContent: ...he said my stings are a bit painful but I am pleased that all worked out and I could help...
...Bill often gets painful “flashbacks”，in which unwanted memories intrude into his consciousness...
...they are also the people who care enough to see you through this painful realization...
...Wilsons of the world as the painful obligation to explain the racial facts of life to someone who hadn't quite learned them yet...
...telecoms and the news business that were painful for existing firms but welcomed by millions of consumers...

synos.tran: 痛苦的；疼痛的；令人不快的

trans.tranCn: 疼痛的， 引起疼痛的； 困难的； 令人不快的
trans.tranOther: if a part of your body is painful, it hurts
